item.description:
Do you have one of those ugly sweaters that you never wear? Well, now is the time to get good use out of it. We have added special prizes for the most ugly sweater and original holiday hat contest.

As always we will be collecting gifts for the less fortunate by holding a drive for "Toys for Tots". This is a combined event and will be our only gathering for the month of December. Mark your calendar! Bring an unwrapped childs gift to donate and entrance fee is free!

group.name: EMREIA-Eastern Mass Real Estate Investors Assoc.

item.name: Annual Holiday Networking event for "Toys for Tots" and Ugly Sweater Contest!
